content: Starting today we are launching a contest for only active Indian members on our Local Board. The contest is extended to the 15th of January and prize distribution will be done after the 15th of January 2024. I and @Heisenberg_Hunter will review the content and decide on the winner.Rules:1. Unique content would be accepted for this contest.2. Plagiarised or AI-written content won't be considered. You will receive a Neutral tag from a DT member if caught. 3. You can create as many topics as you want but it should be of minimum 250 words. 4. News-based topics would be accepted but they should be related to India. 5. Posting on the wrong board/subboard would automatically disqualify your topic.6. Please do not create multiple replies on this thread while updating your topic link. Please use the below format.Format for submission. Code:Your BTC Address (Segwit):Link:1.2.3.4.Winning amount:0.000966BTC at the current rate of 1BTC = $37,137.90 it is valued as $35.88.
